page.title: 16The Meadow Grange Nursery
page.content: Meadow Grange Nursery is situated at Honey Hill on the A290, the main road between Canterbury and Whitstable. A nursery has been there since l933, the present owner having it for the last l9 years. It covers 2 1/2 acres, with 29,000 square feet of modern glass houses in which the tomatoes, cucumbers and lettuce are, for the first time, being organically grown. All the bedding plants and geraniums are grown at the Nursery with about half the alpine plants and shrubs being bought in, as are the fruit trees. A great variety of tubs, pots and garden ornaments are available, including paving slabs for patios. There is a small shop for fruit,eggs, vegetables and flowers which helps the local people as there is no other shop for l l/2 miles.
